Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini ukushaya (kwehora)
Usuku lapho abantu beyobe benjengezimvemvane ezisakaziwe
Futhi	izintaba	ziyoba	sengathi	uvolo	oyimpafumpafu (ziyobhidlika ziqonde)
Futhi mayelana nalowo izikalo (zezenzo) zakhe (ezinhle) ziyobalula
Manjalo indawo yakhe yokuhlala umgodi wesihogo
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi kuyini lokho
